title: In the Footsteps of Iskandar
description: During the early seventies, Dan Silberman backpacked through Europe, Asia, North and South America before settling down in the foothills of the Canadian Rockies. In the Footsteps of Iskandar is his first novel about the heydays of the Hippie Trail and drifting through countries that have since become practically impassable to western wanderers.
author: Dan Silberman
